item.title: Ansible reporting with ARA: Ansible Run Analysis
item.description:
I had a Slack conversation with some friends from work (B, R and G) the other day. It went somewhat like this:

B: “Hey, have you guys ever heard of ARA?”

This was followed by 5 minutes of the deafening sound of contextualisation and Google searches by everyone on the channel.

R: “Nope, but every piece of technology that could enable Ansible to catch up with PuppetDB/Board would be very much appreciated”
